category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 25 (Organization and Meeting)
contents: Article 25 (Composition and Meeting) ① Details regarding the composition of the committee and operation of the meeting shall be in accordance with the Sports Association's 「Regulations on the Establishment and Operation of the Advisory Committee」, and shall include the following members. Revised September 28, 2022. 1. The chairperson shall be the chairman or secretary general. 2. Among the members, the vice-village mayor, the head of the Planning and Coordination Headquarters, and the labor union chairperson are appointed ex officio as internal members, and external members include experts in human rights management or human rights fields and those with experience in related organizations under Article 3, Paragraph 4. ② Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the Chairman may dismiss a member if the member falls under any of the following items. 1. In case of involvement in human rights violations 2. In case of disclosure of secrets learned in the course of duties ③ The term of office of committee members shall be two years, and may be reappointed only once. However, there is no limit to the number of reappointments for ex officio members. The term of office is not based on the number of days but is based on the regular general meeting of the Korea Sports Council. In this case, the expiration date of the term is the day before the regular general meeting. Newly established on September 28, 2022. ④ In order to minimize the possibility of unfair intervention by interested parties in the deliberation and decision-making process of the committee by diagnosing the work ethics of members in advance, appointed members must use Form No. 1 and Form No. 2. must be written and submitted. Newly established 2022. 9. 28.
